p: Additional groups were IP- and IC-inoculated with prototype or mutant BgV chimeras. Protoype BgV C-CG/WNV-prME replicated in 17% of IP-inoculated mice and in all IC-inoculated mice as shown by seroconversion ( Fig 5A and 5B), however, no clinical signs of disease and no neutralising antibodies were recorded for any BgV C-CG/WNV-prME-inoculated mice ( Fig 5Aâ€“5C). Nevertheless, the ability of BgV C-CG/WNV-prME to establish an infection is enhanced when compared to BgV C-CG.
